Query:
SELECT 
					sctl.ID,
					p.cardpan,
					s.firstname || ' ' || s.lastname,
					sctl.SourceMDN,
					TO_CHAR (FROM_TZ(CAST(s.activationtime AS TIMESTAMP),'+00:00') AT TIME ZONE '$(TimeZone)',  'DD-MM-YYYY'),
					sctl.createdBy,
					TO_CHAR (FROM_TZ(CAST(sctl.CreateTime AS TIMESTAMP),'+00:00') AT TIME ZONE '$(TimeZone)',  'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),
					et.DisplayText
				FROM
					subscriber s, 
					subscriber_mdn sm, 
					service_charge_txn_log sctl, 
					transaction_type tt,
					pocket p, 
					enum_text et 
				WHERE 
					sctl.SourceMDN = sm.MDN
					and sctl.TransactionTypeID = tt.ID	
					and tt.transactionName='Activation'					
					and s.id = sm.subscriberid
					and p.mdnid = sm.id
					and p.pockettemplateid=4 
					and et.TagID=6089 
					and sctl.status in(4,5)
					and sctl.status=et.EnumCode 
					and sctl.CreateTime >= ${StartTime}
					and sctl.CreateTime < ${EndTime}
				ORDER BY s.activationtime;
